overview: Hamida, a 51-year-old woman, has been divorced from her ex-husband for over a decade. Upon the discovery of the world of dating apps, she’s intrigued—and ready to explore something new. Her intention: to talk to men on her own terms. Her problem: she has no idea how to use it. Luckily, the one person she lives with, Sana, her twenty-something year old, tech-savvy daughter, can help. If only she were open to it.
title: Birdwatching
